original_text: Sorrowing most of all for the words which he spake, that they should see his face no more. And they accompanied him unto the ship.
korean_text: 다시 그 얼굴을 보지 못하리라 한 말로 말미암아 더욱 근심하고 배에까지 그를 전송하니라

sentences.original_text: for the words which he spake
that they should see his face no more
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그의 얼굴을 다시는 보지 못할 것이라는

sentences.original_text: And they accompanied him unto ship
